EmailTemplate.name: 202006_Portal-Release_June_Operational-Email.Email 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Portal Release Update - Welcome GoDirect Trade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
GoDirect Trade Integration: We now have full integration with GoDirect Trade – Honeywell’s online marketplace for used Aerospace parts. Once logged into Aerospace.Honeywell.com, customers can access Honeywell’s extensive used serviceable material with real-time availability and pricing. To view the release note for this and an FAQ please refer to this page <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes/2020/godirect-trade-integration]]>.
To catch up on latest improvements to MyAerospace, please refer to our Release Notes page here. <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace/release-notes]]>
